title: Detection of X-ray photons by solution-processed lead halide perovskites
title_cn: 固溶卤化钙钛矿对X射线光子的检测
abstract: The evolution of real-time medical diagnostic tools such as angiography and computer tomography from radiography based on photographic plates was enabled by the development of integrated solid-state X-ray photon detectors made from conventional solid-state semiconductors. Recently, for optoelectronic devices operating in the visible and near-infrared spectral regions, solution-processed organic and inorganic semiconductors have also attracted a great deal of attention. Here, we demonstrate a possibility to use such inexpensive semiconductors for the sensitive detection of X-ray photons by direct photon-to-current conversion. In particular, methylammonium lead iodide perovskite (CH3NH3PbI3) offers a compelling combination of fast photoresponse and a high absorption cross-section for X-rays, owing to the heavy Pb and I atoms. Solution-processed photodiodes as well as photoconductors are presented, exhibiting high values of X-ray sensitivity (up to 25 μC mGyair−1 cm−3) and responsivity (1.9 × 104 carriers/photon), which are commensurate with those obtained by the current solid-state technology.
abstract_cn: 通过开发由传统固态半导体制成的集成式固态X射线光子探测器，可以实现基于照相板的放射线照相术（如血管造影术和计算机断层摄影术）的实时医学诊断工具的发展。近来，对于在可见光谱和近红外光谱区域中操作的光电器件，溶液处理的有机和无机半导体也引起了极大的关注。在这里，我们展示了使用这种廉价的半导体通过直接的光子到电流转换来灵敏地检测X射线光子的可能性。特别是，甲基铵碘化铅钙钛矿（CH <sub> 3 </ sub> NH <sub> 3 </ sub> PbI <sub> 3 </ sub>）提供了快速的光响应和高吸收截面的引人注目的组合X射线中的Pb和I原子很重。提出了溶液处理的光电二极管以及光电导体，它们具有很高的X射线敏感度值（高达25＆＃8197;＆＃956; C＆＃8197; mGy <sub> air </ sub> <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>＆＃8197; cm <sup>＆＃8722; 3 </ sup>）和响应度（1.9＆＃8201;＆＃215;＆＃8201; 10 <sup> 4 </ sup>＆＃ 8197; carriers / photon），与目前的固态技术所获得的相当。</ p>

title: Vectorial dissipative solitons in vertical-cavity surface-emitting lasers with delays
title_cn: 具有延迟的垂直腔面发射激光器中的矢量耗散孤子
abstract: We show that the nonlinear polarization dynamics of a vertical-cavity surface-emitting laser placed in an external cavity lead to the emission of temporal dissipative solitons. These are vectorial solitons because they appear as localized pulses in the polarized output, but leave the total intensity constant. When the cavity roundtrip time is much longer than the soliton duration, several independent solitons as well as bound states (molecules) may be hosted in the cavity. All these solitons coexist together and with the background solution. The experimental results are well described by a theoretical model that can be reduced to a single delayed equation for the polarization orientation, which allows the vectorial solitons to be interpreted as polarization kinks. A Floquet analysis is used to confirm the mutual independence of the observed solitons.
abstract_cn: 我们表明，放置在外腔中的垂直腔表面发射激光器的非线性偏振动力学会导致时间耗散孤子的发射。 这些是矢量孤子，因为它们在极化输出中显示为局部脉冲，但总强度保持不变。 当空腔往返时间比孤子持续时间长得多时，空腔中可能包含几个独立的孤子以及束缚态（分子）。 所有这些孤子与背景解决方案共存。 通过理论模型可以很好地描述实验结果，该理论模型可以简化为极化定向的单个延迟方程式，从而可以将矢量孤子解释为极化纽结。 用Floquet分析确定所观察到的孤子的相互独立性。

title: Quantum cascade laser frequency stabilization at the sub-Hz level
title_cn: 量子级联激光器频率稳定在亚Hz级
abstract: High-precision measurements with molecules may refine our knowledge of various fields of physics, from atmospheric and interstellar physics to the standard model or physics beyond it. Most of them can be cast as absorption frequency measurements, particularly in the mid-infrared ‘molecular fingerprint’ region, creating the need for narrow-linewidth lasers of well-controlled frequency. Quantum cascade lasers provide a wide spectral coverage anywhere in the mid-infrared, but show substantial free-running frequency fluctuations. Here, we demonstrate that the excellent stability and accuracy of an ultra-stable near-infrared laser, transferred from a metrological institute through a fibre link, can be copied to a quantum cascade laser using an optical frequency comb. The obtained relative stability and accuracy of 2 × 10−15 and 10−14 exceed those demonstrated so far with quantum cascade lasers by almost two orders of magnitude. This set-up enables us to measure molecular absorption frequencies with state-of-the-art uncertainties, confirming its potential for ultra-high-precision spectroscopy.
abstract_cn: 使用分子进行高精度测量可以完善我们对各种物理领域的知识，从大气和星际物理学到标准模型或超越物理的模型。它们中的大多数可以用作吸收频率测量，特别是在中红外分子指纹中。区域，因此需要频率可控的窄线宽激光器。量子级联激光器可在中红外的任何地方提供较宽的光谱覆盖范围，但会显示出较大的自由运行频率波动。在这里，我们证明了可以通过光频梳将计量机构通过光纤链路传输的超稳定近红外激光的出色稳定性和准确性复制到量子级联激光器中。所获得的2＆＃8201;＆＃215;＆＃8201; 10 ＆＃8722; 15 和10 ＆＃8722; 14 的相对稳定性和准确性超过了所证明的相对稳定性和准确性。与量子级联激光器相差两个数量级。这种设置使我们能够测量具有最新不确定性的分子吸收频率，从而证实了其在超高精度光谱学中的潜力。

title: Flying particle sensors in hollow-core photonic crystal fibre
title_cn: 中空光子晶体光纤中的飞行粒子传感器
abstract: Optical fibre sensors make use of diverse physical effects to measure parameters such as strain, temperature and electric field. Here we introduce a new class of reconfigurable fibre sensor, based on a ‘flying-particle’ optically trapped inside a hollow-core photonic crystal fibre and illustrate its use in electric field and temperature sensing with high spatial resolution. The electric field distribution near the surface of a multi-element electrode is measured with a resolution of ∼100 μm by monitoring changes in the transmitted light signal due to the transverse displacement of a charged silica microparticle trapped within the hollow core. Doppler-based velocity measurements are used to map the gas viscosity, and thus the temperature, along a hollow-core photonic crystal fibre. The flying-particle approach represents a new paradigm in fibre sensors, potentially allowing multiple physical quantities to be mapped with high positional accuracy over kilometre-scale distances.
abstract_cn: 光纤传感器利用多种物理效应来测量诸如应变，温度和电场等参数。在这里，我们基于＆＃8216; flying-particle＆＃8217;引入了新型的可重构光纤传感器。光学捕获在空心光子晶体光纤内部，并以高空间分辨率说明了其在电场和温度传感中的用途。通过监视由于带电的二氧化硅微粒的横向位移而引起的透射光信号的变化，可以测量分辨率为的多元素电极表面附近的电场分布，该分辨率为＆＃8764; 100＆＃8197;＆＃956; m被困在空心中。基于多普勒的速度测量用于沿着空心光子晶体光纤绘制气体粘度，从而绘制温度。飞行粒子方法代表了光纤传感器的一个新范例，可能允许在千米尺度距离上以高位置精度映射多个物理量。

title: Population inversion and giant bandgap renormalization in atomically thin WS2 layers
title_cn: 原子薄WS2层中的种群反转和巨型带隙重归一化
abstract: Control of the optical properties of matter on ultrashort timescales is of both fundamental interest and central importance for applications in photonics. It is desirable to achieve pronounced changes over a broad spectral range using the least possible amount of material. Here, we demonstrate a dramatic change over a spectral range of hundreds of meV on the femtosecond timescale in the optical response of atomically thin two-dimensional crystals of the transition-metal dichalcogenide WS2 following excitation by intense optical pump pulses. Our findings reveal the role of extremely strong Coulomb interactions. At the direct gap, we observe a Mott transition from excitonic states to free carriers, accompanied by a giant bandgap renormalization of approximately 500 meV and the development of population inversion.
abstract_cn: 在超短时间尺度上控制物质的光学性质对于光子学的应用既具有根本的兴趣，又具有至关重要的意义。 希望使用尽可能少的材料在宽光谱范围内实现明显的变化。 在这里，我们证明了在飞秒时间尺度上数百meV的光谱范围内，过渡金属二卤化钨WS 2 的原子薄二维晶体的光学响应在被强光激发后发生了显着变化。 泵浦脉冲。 我们的发现揭示了极强的库仑相互作用的作用。 在直接的间隙处，我们观察到了从激子态到自由载流子的Mott跃迁，伴随着大约500＆mev的巨大带隙重正态化以及种群反转的发展。

title: Macroscopic and direct light propulsion of bulk graphene material
title_cn: 本体石墨烯材料的宏观和直接光推进
abstract: It has been a great challenge to achieve the direct light manipulation of matter on a bulk scale. In this work the direct light propulsion of matter is observed on a macroscopic scale using a bulk graphene-based material. The unique structure and properties of graphene, and the novel morphology of the bulk three-dimensional linked graphene material make it capable not only of absorbing light at various wavelengths but also of emitting energetic electrons efficiently enough to drive the bulk material, following Newtonian mechanics. Thus, the unique photonic and electronic properties of individual graphene sheets are manifested in the response of the bulk state. These results offer an exciting opportunity to bring about bulk-scale light manipulation with the potential to realize long-sought applications in areas such as the solar sail and space transportation driven directly by sunlight.
abstract_cn: 实现对物质的直接光操纵是一个巨大的挑战。 在这项工作中，使用块状石墨烯基材料在宏观尺度上观察到了物质的直接光推进。 石墨烯的独特结构和性质，以及三维立体连接的石墨烯材料的新颖形貌，使其不仅能够吸收各种波长的光，而且能够按照牛顿力学原理有效地发射高能电子，以驱动整体材料。 因此，各个石墨烯片的独特的光子和电子性质表现在体态的响应中。 这些结果为实现大规模的光操纵提供了令人振奋的机会，有可能在诸如太阳帆和由阳光直接驱动的空间运输等领域实现长期寻求的应用。
